pages.text: Herpetogaster is a strange and poorly-understood small creature. It appears to have attached itself to the sea-floor or to certain sponges using a stalk-like appendage, and was formed as a bag-like body with tentacles at the mouth end.
$(l)Eats:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Shears
